entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:48 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 5:48 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early in the evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:48 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
